segments.text: Good afternoon.Welcome to China.May I see your passport , customs and health declaration form ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you.What ' s your occupation , Mr . Smith ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm the general manager of the Far-East Industry Corporation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are here on business , aren't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have been invited by the East Import & Export Corporation of China for business talks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see.Do you have anything to declare ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have some foreign currency to declare .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you please fill out this currency declaration form ? It's a record of the foreign currency you have brough in .
segments.speaker: S1
